name: Stormsoul
summary: Your elemental ancestor's influence manifests in you as tumultuous, thundering storms, with dark clouds and bolts of lightning.
description:
Your elemental ancestor's influence manifests in you as tumultuous, thundering storms, with dark clouds and bolts of lightning. You gain resistance to electricity equal to half your level (minimum 1).Traits

Lineage: A feat with this trait indicates a character's descendance from a particular type of creature. You can have only one lineage feat. You can select a lineage feat only at 1st level, and you can't retrain into or out of these feats.

Sylph: Sylphs are planar scions descended from djinn.
